# believe_episodes (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_episodes" "example_episodes" {
  character_focus = "character_focus"
  season = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `character_focus` (String) Filter by character focus (character ID)
- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `season` (Number) Filter by season

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `air_date` (String) Original air date
- `biscuits_with_boss_moment` (String) Notable biscuits with the boss scene
- `character_focus` (List of String) Characters with significant development
- `director` (String) Episode director
- `episode_number` (Number) Episode number within season
- `id` (String) Unique identifier (format: s##e##)
- `main_theme` (String) Central theme of the episode
- `memorable_moments` (List of String) Standout moments from the episode
- `runtime_minutes` (Number) Episode runtime in minutes
- `season` (Number) Season number
- `synopsis` (String) Brief plot synopsis
- `ted_wisdom` (String) Key piece of Ted wisdom from the episode
- `title` (String) Episode title
- `us_viewers_millions` (Number) US viewership in millions
- `viewer_rating` (Number) Viewer rating out of 10
- `writer` (String) Episode writer(s)
